# Welcome to Intune Labs

We run a poly-repo organization with shared guardrails, reusable CI, and security-by-default. Explore pinned repositories to see flagship services, SDKs, research projects, and infrastructure tooling.

## What to expect
- Secure-by-default pipelines: CodeQL, Scorecard, provenance
- Clearly owned repos: CODEOWNERS enforced via rulesets
- Templates for services, SDKs, and research projects
